articles.description: Kids of color died at a higher rater than adults of color, who are more than twice as likely to die from the coronavirus compared to white adults.

articles.title: COVID-19: This Is The Deadliest County In The Deadliest State - msnNOW
articles.description: The COVID-19 pandemic’s growth has slowed in the U.S. New confirmed cases rose at over 200,000 a month ago. Yesterday, they were up 64,375 to 28,325,091, which is 25% of the world’s total. Death in the U.S. rose by 4,000 many days a month ago. Yesterday, ther…
